header.title: Materializing a Powerful Magick Mentor and Other Acts of Ancient Magick
header.category: Western Esotericism, Grimoire Magic, Practical Occultism

central_thesis: The book asserts that individuals can utilize "Genuine Ancient Magick" through specific rituals, invocations, and mental techniques to manifest desires, achieve success, and transform their lives. It posits that this power is inherent and accessible to all, not just skilled adepts, and can be applied to various aspects of life, including money, love, health, knowledge, and protection, by interacting with various spiritual entities and energies.

structure_content.summary: This section introduces magick as an ageless power source that allows individuals to attract desires, achieve success, punish enemies, and fulfill life. It sets the stage for revealing secret spells and rituals, emphasizing magick's potential for total life transformation.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter One: INITIATION: HOW THE POWER OF GENUINE ANCIENT MAGICK CAN CHANGE YOUR LIFE!
structure_content.summary: This chapter outlines the fundamental philosophy of Nagel's system, asserting that magick, rooted in Benefic Forces, is accessible to anyone to create their desired future. It details the preparation for ritual practice, including the setup of an altar, the importance of a 'Book of Shadows' for tracking desires and results, and the 'Purification Ceremony' for instruments, followed by the 'Cabalistic Circle of Protection' ritual.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter Two: USING THE POWERS OF THE SEVEN OLYMPIC SPIRITS FOR HAPPINESS AND SUCCESS
structure_content.summary: This chapter describes how to invoke the Seven Olympic Spirits (Aratron, Bethor, Hagith, Och, Ophiel, Phaleg, Phul), each associated with a planet and governing specific areas of life such as wealth, love, health, or protection. It provides a general invocation structure and specific rituals, including ingredients, timing (day and hour of the associated planet), and detailed steps for success, love, gambling luck, health, secret knowledge, protection, and influencing others.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter Three: HOW TO CREATE A SPIRIT FAMILIAR TO BE YOUR OBEDIENT SERVANT AND MAGICKAL MENTOR
structure_content.summary: This section reveals the method for creating a 'Spirit Familiar' or 'Magick Mentor,' described as a pseudo-life form and astral extension of oneself. The 'Spirit Familiar Creation Ritual' involves advanced visualization, drawing a 'Pentagram of Fire,' and calling upon the spirits of the four cardinal winds. It explains communication with the familiar for guidance and how to dismiss it, along with a 'Spirit-Vision Power Ritual' for seeing into the future using a crystal ball.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter Four: USING THE POWER OF MAGICK CHARMS, POTIONS AND POWDERS TO WIN THE HEARTS OF OTHERS
structure_content.summary: This chapter focuses on love magick, providing an 'A to Z Guide' of ancient charms, potions, and powders (e.g., Amethyst, Adam & Eve root, Balm, Coriander, Cumin, Eggs, Emerald, Elecampane, Endive, Mandrake, Myrtle, Olives, Periwinkle, Red Wine, Roses, Rue, Snake Root, Sea Holly, Venusian Love Charm, Venusian Love Potion, Vervain, Yarrow). It details their ingredients and methods for attracting love, ensuring fidelity, or arousing passion, while also stressing the need for real-world interaction.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter Five: THE SECRETS OF OCCULT POWER
structure_content.summary: This chapter delves into mind control, positive thinking, and 'Transcendental Meditation' as crucial elements for becoming a 'positive channel' for magickal powers. It also introduces 'Psychometry' for sensing vibrations to find lost items or people, and 'Dowsing' using a divining rod for discovering hidden treasures, detailing the practical exercises for developing these abilities.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter Six: HOW TO USE THE ANCIENT POWER OF ASTRAL PROJECTION TO BECOME AN INVISIBLE ASTRAL TRAVELLER
structure_content.summary: This chapter explains 'Astral Projection' as the ability to separate one's consciousness from the physical body to travel invisibly across time and space, visit the 'Spirit World,' and gain secret information. It includes an 'Astral Travel Protection Ritual' to safeguard the physical body during astral journeys and emphasizes the importance of practice for success.

structure_content.chapter_title: Chapter Seven: THE SECRET SPELLS AND RITUALS OF ADVANCED CEREMONIAL MAGICK
structure_content.summary: The concluding chapter reiterates that magickal power is within everyone, activated by concentrated desire, and channeled through 'Astral Light.' It introduces the 'Astral Light Attunement Ritual' for daily practice. This chapter also contains specific advanced rituals: an "Incantation to Destroy an Enemy" (explicitly labeled 'Black Magick'), the 'Astral Light Health Ritual,' and the creation of 'The Talisman of Almadel' for good luck and protection.

key_concepts.definition: The core power source, inherent and accessible to all, which is stimulated by concentrated desire and used through rituals and mental techniques to manifest desires and improve life.
Positive occult forces invoked for constructive purposes, explicitly distinguished from Satanic or evil forces.
The systematic practice of using spells, invocations, and specific actions with tools and timing to achieve desired results in the material world.
A personal notebook used to record desires, details of rituals performed, and the outcomes or results of magical workings, aiding in the development of one's magical power.

A ritual involving specific hand gestures (Qabalistic Cross), visualization of light spheres and pentagrams at cardinal points, and invocation of Archangels (Raphael, Michael, Gabriel, Uriel) to create an impenetrable force-field against all evil influences during magical operations.

Entities (Aratron, Bethor, Hagith, Och, Ophiel, Phaleg, Phul) listed in the 'Arbatel of Magic,' each associated with a specific planet and governing distinct areas of physical manifestation (e.g., wealth, love, health, knowledge, protection), invoked through planetary day/hour rituals.
A pseudo-life form or an astral extension of the practitioner, created through ritualistic visualization and invocation to provide guidance, secret occult knowledge, and aid in magical operations.
An inner dimension or higher reality where mystical events occur and spirits reside, connected to the physical world, and accessible through astral projection and certain rituals.
An occult power residing in the subconscious mind, developed through crystal ball scrying and interaction with a Spirit Familiar, to perceive events in the future or distant places.

The art of sensing and understanding invisible energy fields or 'psychometric vibrations' emanating from objects to gain information about individuals, events, or hidden things like lost treasures or missing persons.

The ability to separate one's consciousness (astral body) from the physical body, enabling invisible travel across dimensions of time and space, to visit the Spirit World, or discover secret information.

An intangible form of electromagnetic ether, originating on the Astral Plane, which can be imprinted with thoughts, desires, invocations, and chants to generate magickal power and produce desired physical or emotional reactions.
The energetic force produced by intense emotional desire and focused thoughts, which is stirred into dynamic and creative action during magical rituals to materialize desired outcomes.
A negative consequence that can occur when magick is used for selfish or non-genuine purposes, rather than true need.

practical_system.description: Nagel's system is a syncretic, operative magical framework asserting that "Genuine Ancient Magick" is an inherent kinetic energy within every individual, stimulated by intense desire and focused thought. This energy is channeled through specific rituals, invocations, and mental exercises to interact with various spiritual entities (Benefic Beings, Olympic Spirits, Familiars, Spirits of the Dead) and energies (Astral Light) to manifest desires in the material world. Key requirements for success include strong desire, unwavering belief/faith, focused concentration, and strict secrecy regarding one's magical endeavors. The system provides a structured, albeit simplified, approach to traditional ceremonial magic principles.
tools: Altar (e.g., small coffee table, placed facing East within a nine-foot or three-foot circular area)
Altar Cloth (specific colors: white for purification, gold/yellow for Och, green for Hagith, blue for Bethor, black for Aratron/Phaleg, red for Olympic Power Over Others/Talisman of Almadel)
Candles (specific colors and quantities per ritual: white, gold, green, blue, black, red, purple; often three in a triangle)

Incense (specific types: sandalwood for initiation, saffron for Och, rose for Hagith, frankincense for Bethor, musk for Aratron/Olympic Power Over Others/Talisman of Almadel, pine for Olympic Health, sassafras for Phaleg)
Ink (specific colors: gold/yellow for Och, green for Hagith, blue for Bethor, black for Aratron/Phaleg, red for Talisman of Almadel)
Astrological Stones (specific to the planet of the invoked spirit, or a stone of similar color)
Book of Shadows (for recording desires, rituals, and outcomes)
Joss sticks and suitable container (for incense)
Black Velvet Cloth (for placing crystal ball)
Divining Rod (Y-shaped branch from a one-year-old tree or a metal coathanger, for psychometry)
Photograph(s) (of enemy for destruction ritual, of deceased for necromancy, of desired person for Olympic Power Over Others)
rituals: Purification Ceremony (for magical instruments, on Sunday)
Cabalistic Circle of Protection (foundational ritual for safety, involving Qabalistic Cross and Archangelic invocations, performed before other rituals)
Astral Light Attunement Ritual (daily meditation for mind-cleansing and attunement to Astral Light)
Spirit Familiar Creation Ritual (complex visualization and invocation sequence using pentagrams and elemental calls to create an astral companion)
Spirit-Vision Power Ritual (using a crystal ball for scrying the future)

Seven Olympic Spirit Rituals (specific invocations for Aratron, Bethor, Hagith, Och, Ophiel, Phaleg, Phul, tailored to planetary days/hours for diverse goals like success, love, health, protection, knowledge, and influencing others)
Love Charms, Potions & Powders (various simple preparations for attracting love or ensuring fidelity)
Incantation to Destroy an Enemy (explicitly labeled 'Black Magick,' involving a photograph of the victim, black candles, and destructive invocation)
Astral Light Health Ritual (visualization of golden healing light focused on diseased areas)
Invocation to Summon Spirits of the Dead (necromantic ritual using a photograph of the deceased, black and white candles, performed at midnight)
Talisman of Almadel Creation (ritual for good luck and protection, involving inscribing a specific seal and carrying it)

relevant_quotes.text: Magick! Every time you hear the word it invokes racial memories from deep within you of ancient and mysterious powers. Powers that can be used to attract money, arouse love and desire in another of your choosing, bring good health and youthful vitality, enjoy luck in games of chance, travel invisibly into the homes and minds of others to learn their innermost secrets, and much much more!

The power of ancient magick has the potential to bring an individual such things as: love, money and happiness, yet many people in this world greatly fear anything even remotely connected with that awful word 'occult', believing, quite wrongly and foolishly, that they are dealing with dark and Satanic forces which eventually lead to a one way trip to eternal damnation; and as such, continue to exist with poor health, financial limitations, and never realize their full potential as an individual.
Desires are the most powerful force in the Cosmos. They can, and do, create the future.

Believe in the powers you invoke; know that they have the potential to bring you all those things which you truly desire to have manifest in your life experiences. Never for one moment doubt the efficacy of a spell or ritual. Doubt is tantamount to hitting your head against that proverbial brick wall you get nowhere and hurt yourself in the process.

Until you have achieved each and every one of your desires, keep the fact that you are utilizing ancient magick to improve your life a closely guarded secret. Telling others of your magickal endeavour will only open you to ridicule and suggestions that you have become unbalanced. So please, keep your mouth shut.
The five-pointed pentagram is, above all others, the most powerful symbol of protection in the occult world of magick.
Do not permit the familiar to leave the protection of the circle, as this would cause its instant destruction and a small part of your own self would be lost forever.

Using magick to arouse love in another is fine, but we need to be sure that we are using it to attract the right person – someone who will be compatible with us on all levels of being: mind, body, soul.

If you are in any doubt whatsoever as to your current state of mental health, I strongly suggest that you dilligently practise a form of "mind-cleansing" technique like the one described in Chapter Five of this book. When you are confident that you have achieved the right frame of mind with which to harness and manipulate Astral Light Power then – and only then – proceed onto the Advanced Ceremonial Magick techniques described in the following pages of this chapter.

Please Note: This is genuine Black Magick from the Middle Ages with the only difference being the photograph in lieu of a waxen image, and as such should only be approached with extreme care. It is definitely not something to be played around with. We are dealing with highly destructive forces.

critical_analysis.relevance: The book offers a practical, results-oriented magical system highly relevant for those seeking self-empowerment and direct manifestation techniques. It synthesizes elements from traditional grimoire magic and ceremonial magic with contemporary self-help concepts of visualization and positive thinking, making ancient practices accessible for modern personal goals. Its emphasis on inner belief, concentration, and ethical (mostly) application aligns with a broad spiritual and self-improvement audience, distinguishing it from purely academic or historically focused texts.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience is primarily beginners or individuals curious about practical occultism and personal transformation through magic, without requiring extensive prior knowledge or complex rituals. The simplified language, step-by-step instructions, and case studies aim to make the system approachable. The inclusion of 'Black Magick' with explicit warnings also caters to those intrigued by the full spectrum of magical potential, albeit with caution.
